ENVIRONMENTAL RESPONSIBILITYA point of pride for Microchip, the Gresham Site Services Reverse Osmosis 
and De-Ionization (RODI) Team has received the Platinum Award from 
the City of Gresham for 15 consecutive years of operating an acid waste 
neutralization (AWN) system with 100 percent Pretreatment Compliance. 
The facility has received zero AWN compliance violations during the past  
15 years.
